articles.title: After loss to Warren, Republican John Deaton announces another run for Senate
articles.description:
“Ed Markey is MIA, rarely seen here and rarely delivering results in Washington, the place he's called home since the 70s,” John Deaton said in a new campaign video.

The post After loss to Warren, Republican John Deaton announces another run for Senate appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Deaton announces another Senate run after losing to Elizabeth Warren in 2024.
Deaton criticizes Senator Ed Markey for lack of visibility and results since the 1970s.
Deaton's campaign may influence local Republican support in the upcoming 2026 elections.
